thread.title: Jackie Mason: Madonna is a ‘deranged yenta’ | Page Six
thread.title_full: Jackie Mason: Madonna is a ‘deranged yenta’ | Page Six

author: Page Six Team
title: Jackie Mason: Madonna is a ‘deranged yenta’ | Page Six
text:
Amid intense partisan discourse since the election of Donald Trump , perhaps the only issue both sides agree on is how inane Madonna ’s crude comments were at the Women’s March on Washington. 
Cyndi Lauper said on “Watch What Happens Live,” “Anger is not better than clarity and humanity . . . Yelling just jacks people up. It doesn’t communicate any kind of humanity or any kind of story that would open another person’s mind.” At the march, Madonna yelled “f - - k you” and “suck a d - - k” while singing one of her songs.
Lauper praised Scarlett Johansson’s speech as “clear and eloquent.”
Meanwhile, comic Jackie Mason weighed in on the Material Girl’s address by telling Aaron Klein’s Sunday AM 970 show “The Answer,” “I don’t know why anybody even quotes Madonna . . . Nobody cares about anything she says because, let’s be honest about it — when she sings, she sings for a hundred million people. When she talks, everybody disappears.”
He also called her — in what might be the worst borscht-belt insult — a “deranged yenta.”
